alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:21PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow along with very strong winds and reduced visibilities in blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 65 MPH will be possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches possible. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
